name: Invincible Tyrant
author: maikuchini27
notes: After building every tier 1 deck since september (except CA) ive finally made first KOG with... sylvans. Had to learn the hard way of basic things like predicting what your opponents deck is and strategising your win condition and reading backrow giveaways more thoroughly etc. But in the end i feel that is what earned the KOG and sylvans was the best deck to help me learn these fundamentals.
